data.eml:eml: A new species of the pontoniine shrimp genus Onycocaris Nobili, 1904 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) from Sagami Bay, central Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Itou, Isamu (2012): A new species of the pontoniine shrimp genus Onycocaris Nobili, 1904 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) from Sagami Bay, central Japan. Zootaxa 3440: 50-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214120
